did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: St. Paul's Lutheran Church of Cochoton records, 1861-1924.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: St. Paul's Lutheran Church of Cochoton (Cochoton, N.Y.)

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Register of baptisms, funerals, communicants, marriages and confirmations for 1861-1882. Also included is the bulletin for the cornerstone laying in 1923 and a newspaper clipping for the dedication of the new church in 1924.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: St. Paul's Lutheran Church was organized in 1860 under the ministry of Reverend W.T. Stroebel. The church was built in 1861 under the name of St. Paul's German Evangelical Lutheran Church. In 1869 a separation took place in the church. In 1923 a cornerstone was laid for a new church with the dedication held in 1924.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Register of baptisms, funerals, communicants, marriages and confirmations for 1861-1882. Also included is the bulletin for the cornerstone laying in 1923 and a newspaper clipping for the dedication of the new church in 1924.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: Records may not be published or otherwise released in such form that any individual mentioned in the records can be identified.
